languages.text: {n}Иеронимус с усмешкой смотрит на вас.{/n} "Ну конечно ты слышал{mf||а}. Только подумай, чьи слова ты повторяешь сейчас. Кто вложил их в твою голову, желает ли он процветания Империуму? Ты подумай, подумай".

traits.locale_text: {n}Иеронимус с усмешкой смотрит на вас.{/n} "Ну конечно ты слышал{mf||а}. Только подумай, чьи слова ты повторяешь сейчас. Кто вложил их в твою голову, желает ли он процветания Империуму? Ты подумай, подумай".

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus looks at you with a smirk.{/n} "Well, of course you've heard that. But just consider for a moment whose words you are repeating right now. The one who put them into your head — do they mean the Imperium well? Think on it."
languages.original_text: {n}Иеронимус с усмешкой смотрит на вас.{/n} "Ну конечно ты слышал{mf||а}. Только подумай, чьи слова ты повторяешь сейчас. Кто вложил их в твою голову, желает ли он процветания Империуму? Ты подумай, подумай".

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronimus looks at you with a smirk.{/n} "Well, of course you've heard that. But just consider for a moment whose words you are repeating right now. The one who put them into your head — do they mean the Imperium well? Think on this."

{n}Hieronimus looks at you with a smirk.{/n} "Well, of course you've heard that. But just consider for a moment whose words you are repeating right now. The one who put them into your head — do they mean the Imperium well? Think on this."

{n}Hieronymus looks at you with a smirk.{/n} "Well, of course you've heard that. But just consider for a moment whose words you are repeating right now. The one who put them into your head — do they mean the Imperium well? Think on it."

{n}Hieronymus looks at you with a smirk.{/n} "Well, of course you've heard that. But just consider for a moment whose words you are repeating right now. The one who put them into your head — do they mean the Imperium well? Think on it."

{n}Hieronymus looks at you with a smirk.{/n} "Well, of course you've heard that. But just consider for a moment whose words you are repeating right now. The one who put them into your head — do they mean the Imperium well? Think on it."

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯笑眯眯地看着你。{/n}“没错，你确实会听过这样的版本。但请考虑一下，你重复的是哪些人说过的话？把这些内容灌输到你的脑子里的人，他们希望帝国变得强盛吗？好好思考一下吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus looks at you with a smirk.{/n} "Well, of course you've heard that. But just consider for a moment whose words you are repeating right now. The one who put them into your head — do they mean the Imperium well? Think on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯笑眯眯地看着你。{/n}“没错，你确实会听过这样的版本。但请考虑一下，你重复的是哪些人说过的话？把这些内容灌输到你的脑子里的人，他们希望帝国变得强盛吗？好好思考一下吧。”

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus te mira y sonríe con suficiencia.{/n} «No me sorprende. Piense por un segundo en quién pronunció esas palabras que repite, en quién las depositó en su mente. ¿Siente bondad hacia el Imperium? Piénselo».
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus looks at you with a smirk.{/n} "Well, of course you've heard that. But just consider for a moment whose words you are repeating right now. The one who put them into your head — do they mean the Imperium well? Think on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus te mira y sonríe con suficiencia.{/n} «No me sorprende. Piense por un segundo en quién pronunció esas palabras que repite, en quién las depositó en su mente. ¿Siente bondad hacia el Imperium? Piénselo».

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスはニヤリと笑みを浮かべてこちらを見る。{/n}「やはりその話を聞かれましたか。ですが、今ご自分で言った言葉を振り返ってみてください。その話をあなたに植えつけた者は、帝国を良く思っている者たちでしょうか？よくお考えください」
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus looks at you with a smirk.{/n} "Well, of course you've heard that. But just consider for a moment whose words you are repeating right now. The one who put them into your head — do they mean the Imperium well? Think on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスはニヤリと笑みを浮かべてこちらを見る。{/n}「やはりその話を聞かれましたか。ですが、今ご自分で言った言葉を振り返ってみてください。その話をあなたに植えつけた者は、帝国を良く思っている者たちでしょうか？よくお考えください」

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus blickt dich höhnisch grinsend an.{/n} "Natürlich habt Ihr das gehört. Aber denkt mal einen Moment darüber nach, wessen Worte Ihr gerade wiederholt. Wer immer sie Euch in den Kopf gesetzt hat – geht es ihm um das Wohl des Imperiums? Denkt darüber nach."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus looks at you with a smirk.{/n} "Well, of course you've heard that. But just consider for a moment whose words you are repeating right now. The one who put them into your head — do they mean the Imperium well? Think on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus blickt dich höhnisch grinsend an.{/n} "Natürlich habt Ihr das gehört. Aber denkt mal einen Moment darüber nach, wessen Worte Ihr gerade wiederholt. Wer immer sie Euch in den Kopf gesetzt hat – geht es ihm um das Wohl des Imperiums? Denkt darüber nach."

languages.text: {n}Hiéronymus vous regarde avec un sourire narquois.{/n} « Oh, je ne doute pas que vous ayez entendu ce genre de choses. Mais réfléchissez bien à la personne qui vous a raconté cette histoire. Celle qui vous a mis ça dans le crâne... Souhaitait-elle le bien de l'Imperium ? Je vous laisse méditer là-dessus. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus looks at you with a smirk.{/n} "Well, of course you've heard that. But just consider for a moment whose words you are repeating right now. The one who put them into your head — do they mean the Imperium well? Think on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiéronymus vous regarde avec un sourire narquois.{/n} « Oh, je ne doute pas que vous ayez entendu ce genre de choses. Mais réfléchissez bien à la personne qui vous a raconté cette histoire. Celle qui vous a mis ça dans le crâne... Souhaitait-elle le bien de l'Imperium ? Je vous laisse méditer là-dessus. »

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus sana yapmacık bir gülümsemeyle bakıyor.{/n} "Elbette öyle duymuşsundur. Bir an durup, bu tekrarladığın cümlelerin kimden çıktığını düşün. Onları kafana kimin koyduğunu düşün. Bu kişiler, İmparatorluk'un iyiliğini mi istiyor? Buna bir kafa yor."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus looks at you with a smirk.{/n} "Well, of course you've heard that. But just consider for a moment whose words you are repeating right now. The one who put them into your head — do they mean the Imperium well? Think on it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus sana gülümseyerek bakıyor.{/n} "Eh, elbette duydukların bu şekildedir ama bu tekrarladığın cümlelerin kimden çıktığını bir düşün. Onları kafana kimin koyduğunu. Bu kişiler İmparatorluk'un iyiliğini mi istiyorlar? Bir düşün."
